name: Clinic Software CRM Leads
author: clinicsoftware

sections.description: Clinic Software速 is a full suite of tools in cloud based created to help Clinics, Doctors, Nurses, Spas, Salons to Grow Sales, Save Time & Get Organized. Looking for a CRM Software alternative? Ten steps ahead. Make running your business Smarter, Better, Faster. Instantly. Clinic Software速.com is a fully-comprehensive SaaS (Software as a Service) in cloud based created to help companies and appointment-based businesses of any industry and size such as Clinics, Spas and Salons with tools that helps to Grow Sales, Save Time & Get Organized. It is also The Most Comprehensive Software (100+ Tools) according to our customers success stories. 98% of customers recommend ClinicSoftware.com Make running your business Smarter, Better, Faster. Instantly.
sections.installation:
1. Download our zip or install directly from WordPress plugins.
  2. Activate plugin and go to plugin Settings page.
  3. Complete the credentials you can find in ClinicSoftware.com CRM – Admin – Api Clients.
  4. Configure your fields on the Fields page.

Your connection and more info you can find on Status page.

Works with Contact Form 7 plugin.

1.1.0

  • Added Mapping page and FAQ page
  • Added marketing list name functionality

1.0

  • Added ClinicSoftware.com API connection and leads integration to sync Contact Form 7 forms to ClinicSoftware.com
